name: Dylan The Driller
summary:
Help Dylan build his city!
Dylan The Driller is a construction-based tower building game that is extremely addictive. Try to build the tallest building. Experiment with different tower shapes. Remember, the tower takes the shape of a construction that you make, which gives you the power to make unique buildings.
Place the buildings that you like in your city. Try making the coolest city possible. it would be pretty cool if the highest skyscraper was in your town!
Also, you get different accessories from the chest and from completing some achievements, you can combine those accessories to make some interesting outfits for Dylan.
